installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Connect%20(pt-BR)/FFmpeg/start.sh -o start.sh
chmod a+x ./start.sh
if [ -d "./logs" ]; then
echo "1.0" > logs/egg_version
else
mkdir logs
echo "1.0" > logs/egg_version
fi
